channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped mattress, 29th November
item.description:
Dumped mattress next to tree on East Dulwich Grove.

item.title: Flytipping on public walkway on Newmarsh Road, 29th November
item.description:
I raised a complaint about this on-going fly-tipping issue 2 weeks ago on fix my street and it's now mysterious not here anymore? Residents have been raising a compliant about this stop all through this year and the council keeps suffenly blamng Peabody and leaving the rubbish to rotten and attrack rats. Please get this cleaned up as soon as possible and put up cameras to prevent the continous flytipping its been going on for years now and is just getting worse and worse.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Newmarsh Road, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous falling hazard. Big hole on a very busy path, 29th November
item.description:
There is a very deep hole and seems very dangerous. The path is very busy with runners and walkers all day. Please could you take a look for us as this is a big safety risk. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 366-376, Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracks on Latham Road, 29th November
item.description:

item.title: Homeless encampment, 29th November
item.description:
There is an unauthorised encampment with tents and a significant build-up of rubbish on the canal towpath. It is growing daily and creating a health, safety and obstruction hazard. This needs enforcement action and full removal of the encampment and waste

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baring Street, Islington, Greater London

item.title: There are a lots of old phone boxes, streets needs to be reviewed and removed them, 29th November
item.description:
Can you update, it is 2 month now when has been reported. Did you contact BT and enviroment department about this ? I can send you another 20 photos of this disgusting phone boxes, unhygienic, from Camberwell green to Elephant Castle. They are from last century. ðŸ¤®

item.title: Flytip outside 2a roydene road, 29th November
item.description:
